attributes.action: to reduce fuel duty by 40 pence a litre to get the economy moving again reducing food prices, business costs and getting workers moving
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to reduce fuel duty (tax) by 40 pence a litre. This will enable people to spend more as food prices will come down transportation costs will reduce significantly, businesses will gain by having more money to reinvest in new innovation and it'll kick start the economy as people will have more money in their pockets to spend again.
